```{r}

FizzBuzz =function(n) {
 if(!is.vector(n)){
    stop("Please input a integer or a vector of integers.")
  }
  if(!is.integer(n)){
    stop("Please input a integer or a vector of integers.")
  }
  if(length(n)==1){
    n <- 1:n
  }

  for (x in n){
    if (x%%15==0) print("FizzBuzz")
    else if (x%%3==0) print("Fizz") 
    else if (x%%5==0) print("Buzz")
    else 
    print(x)
  }
}

FizzBuzz(x)
```
